"Using Partner Characters!":
"There are too many loner ARKS
these days! Even when they get Partner
Cards, they never use them!
Going on an adventure with a partner is
the most bracing experience there is!
If you don't know that, how can you call
yourself an ARKS?!
Amongst my many partners, I can name...
※Clear any quest with an S Rank,
accompanied by Jean."
